name: Planet Recovery
description:
Explore the planet, and find your way to the core.

A platformer with two modes of play. This turned into a bit of an audio experiment during the course of the jam!

Made for Blackthornprod game jam over ~4 days by Dave Allen.

Controls

[Space] to jump.

Arrow keys to move.

Escape to exit (on PC and Mac builds), R to reload the current level.

Builds

For best results try the windows build. The mac build is untested so no guarantees!
